PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : real or complex vector or matrix

DESCRIPTION.P: This function computes v, the matrix of variance-covariance of the "tableau" x (x is a numerical matrix nxp) who gives the values of p variables for n individuals: the (i,j) coefficient of v is v(i,j)=E(xi-xibar)(xj-xjbar), where E is the first moment of a variable, xi is the i-th variable and xibar the mean of the xi variable.

BIBLIO.P: Saporta, Gilbert, Probabilites, Analyse des Donnees et Statistique, Editions Technip, Paris, 1990. Mardia, K.V., Kent, J.T. & Bibby, J.M., Multivariate Analysis, Academic Press, 1979.
